snippet.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase July 2023
snippet.description: Check out gameplay in this brutal new trailer for The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, an upcoming third-person asymmetrical horror experience based on the iconic 1974 horror film. Play as one of the notorious Slaughter family or their victims when Texas Chainsaw Massacre arrives on PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One on August 18, 2023. It will also be launching into Xbox Game Pass (console and PC) on day one.
